name: Wizzy's Escape
description:
Poor Wizzy! The king woke up on the wrong side of the bed and has exiled his wizard, Wizzy, into his deep dark dungeons.  Using only your wits, and a magic staff, work your way up out of the depths of the dungeon to make your escape.

WASD/Joypad/Stick  moves you around.

Space/Face Buttons to fire your spell.

R/Select = Restart level (if you get stuck)

Esc /P/ Start = Pause game.

Everything Changes Theme:

Every puzzle component in Wizzy's Escape can be changed with Wizzy's transmutation spell. Just blast away and see what the components turn into!
